title: Draven Draven in Mystery Gift?
body: I have two accounts, one with a bunch of champs and one with just Draven. If i would send a mystery gift to the one with only draven then would it be 100%  a draven skin? And is there a chance for me to get Draven Draven?

replies.body: You'll need atleast a champion pool of 10 to get a mystery gift, and keep it a mystery.  Having a smaller pool would kind of defeat that purpose, so it's not possible to guarantee a skin.  Sorry for the confusion!
Okay, but is there a possibility to get Draven Draven?

In general, yes because he's a[ legacy skin](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins).  But you'll need to increase your account's champion pool for your specific issue.  I hope that helps!
